mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS ARN, MF_DATE, HOUSE_INFO, MF_FEE, MF_HEAT, MF_ELECT, MF_WATER, MF_TV, MF_CLEAN, MF_SECURITY, MF_ELEVATOR, MF_TRASH, MF_FEE + MF_HEAT + MF_ELECT + MF_WATER + MF_TV + MF_CLEAN + MF_SECURITY + MF_ELEVATOR + MF_TRASH AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT * FROM MANAGEMENT_FEE WHERE HOUSE_INFO = #{houseInfo} ORDER BY MF_DATE DESC) )
